# ggrugby

Code based on [ggsoccer](https://github.com/Torvaney/ggsoccer)

## Overview

*ggrugby* provides functions for plotting rugby events in {ggplot2}

## Installation

```{r, eval = FALSE}

# install.packages("remotes")
remotes::install_github("javiereliomedina/ggrugby")

```

## Usage

```{r example_blank}

library(ggplot2)
library(ggrugby)

ggplot() +
  rugby_pitch() +
  theme_void() 

```
